nodes.text: Wlinc Tchrr was a Kajain'sa'Nikto bookmaker who worked for the Hutts on Tatooine at the time of the Galactic Civil War. He did not talk much about his business to strangers.
In 1 ABY he had a dispute with Imperial officer Gert Talnin, who owed Tchrr money from a gambling debt. Talnin tried to pay the debt with Imperial travel vouchers, which Tchrr did not accept.
Wlinc Tchrr is a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies and can be found in front of the Bestine starport. He is not part of any quest or mission.
